DmCurriculum.description:
The curriculum is a collection of all the syllabi presented to the player at the academy. It is the the skill tree in its entirety.

The core game uses `vanilla_curriculum` and your mods can add to or subtract from that list.

You should only have a single curriculum for your mod.
